024
025package com.github.siroshun09.event4j.bus;
026
027import com.github.siroshun09.event4j.event.Event;
028import com.github.siroshun09.event4j.key.Key;
029import com.github.siroshun09.event4j.listener.Listener;
030import com.github.siroshun09.event4j.listener.MultipleListeners;
031import org.jetbrains.annotations.Contract;
032import org.jetbrains.annotations.NotNull;
033import org.jetbrains.annotations.UnmodifiableView;
034
035import java.util.Collection;
036import java.util.List;
037import java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture;
038import java.util.concurrent.Executor;
039import java.util.concurrent.ForkJoinPool;
040import java.util.function.Consumer;
041import java.util.function.Function;
042import java.util.function.Predicate;
043import java.util.function.Supplier;
044
045/**
046 * An event bus to dispatch events.
047 *
048 * @param <E> the top-level event type
049 */
050public interface EventBus<E> {
051
052    /**
053     * Creates a new {@link EventBus}.
054     * <p>
055     * The top-level event type is {@link Event}.
056     *
057     * @return a new {@link EventBus}
058     */
059    @Contract(value = "-> new", pure = true)
060    static @NotNull EventBus<Event> create() {
061        return create(Event.class, ForkJoinPool.commonPool());
062    }
063
064    /**
065     * Creates a new {@link EventBus} with the specified {@link Executor}.
066     * <p>
067     * The top-level event type is {@link Event}.
068     *
069     * @param asyncExecutor the {@link Executor} to call events asynchronously
070     * @return a new {@link EventBus}
071     */
072    @Contract(value = "_ -> new", pure = true)
073    static @NotNull EventBus<Event> create(@NotNull Executor asyncExecutor) {
074        return create(Event.class, asyncExecutor);
075    }
076
077    /**
078     * Creates a new {@link EventBus} with the specified event type and the specified {@link Executor}.
079     *
080     * @param eventClass the top-level event class
081     * @param <E>        the top-level event type
082     * @return a new {@link EventBus}
083     */
084    @Contract(value = "_ -> new", pure = true)
085    static <E> @NotNull EventBus<E> create(@NotNull Class<E> eventClass) {
086        return create(eventClass, ForkJoinPool.commonPool());
087    }
088
089    /**
090     * Creates a new {@link EventBus} with the specified event type and the specified {@link Executor}.
091     *
092     * @param eventClass    the top-level event class
093     * @param asyncExecutor the {@link Executor} to call events asynchronously
094     * @param <E>           the top-level event type
095     * @return a new {@link EventBus}
096     */
097    @Contract(value = "_,_ -> new", pure = true)
098    static <E> @NotNull EventBus<E> create(@NotNull Class<E> eventClass, @NotNull Executor asyncExecutor) {
099        return new SimpleEventBus<>(eventClass, asyncExecutor);
100    }
101
102    /**
103     * Gets the top-level event type of this event bus.
104     *
105     * @return the top-level event type of this event bus
106     */
107    @NotNull Class<E> getEventClass();
108
109    /**
110     * Gets the {@link EventSubscriber} of the specified event.
111     *
112     * @param eventClass the event class to get the {@link EventSubscriber}
113     * @param <T>        the event type
114     * @return the {@link EventSubscriber} of the specified event
115     * @throws IllegalStateException if this event bus is already closed
116     */
117    @NotNull <T extends E> EventSubscriber<T> getSubscriber(@NotNull Class<T> eventClass);
118
119    /**
120     * Gets the collection of subscribed {@link EventSubscriber}s.
121     * <p>
122     * Included in this collection are subscribers to events
123     * in which {@link #getSubscriber(Class)} has been called at least once.
124     *
125     * @return the collection of subscribed {@link EventSubscriber}s
126     */
127    @NotNull @UnmodifiableView Collection<EventSubscriber<?>> getSubscribers();
128
129    /**
130     * Subscribes multiple listeners.
131     *
132     * @param key       the key that subscribed listeners
133     * @param listeners the {@link MultipleListeners} to subscribe
134     * @return the subscribed listeners
135     * @throws IllegalStateException if this event bus is already closed
136     * @throws IllegalStateException the {@link MultipleListeners} is already subscribed
137     * @see MultipleListeners
138     */
139    @NotNull @UnmodifiableView List<SubscribedListener<?>> subscribeAll(@NotNull Key key,
140                                                                        @NotNull MultipleListeners listeners);
141
142    /**
143     * Unsubscribes multiple listeners.
144     *
145     * @param listeners the {@link MultipleListeners} to unsubscribe
146     * @throws IllegalStateException if this event bus is already closed
147     * @throws IllegalStateException the {@link MultipleListeners} is not subscribed
148     * @see MultipleListeners
149     */
150    void unsubscribeAll(@NotNull MultipleListeners listeners);
151
152    /**
153     * Unsubscribes all listeners subscribed with the specified {@link Key} for this event bus instance.
154     *
155     * @param key the key that subscribed listeners
156     * @throws IllegalStateException if this event bus is already closed
157     */
158    void unsubscribeAll(@NotNull Key key);
159
160    /**
161     * Unsubscribes all listeners that satisfy the given {@link Predicate}.
162     *
163     * @param predicate a predicate which returns true for listeners to be unsubscribed
164     * @throws IllegalStateException if this event bus is already closed
165     */
166    void unsubscribeIf(@NotNull Predicate<SubscribedListener<?>> predicate);
167
168    /**
169     * Dispatches the event to subscribed listeners.
170     * <p>
171     * If an exception is thrown while calling a listener,
172     * {@link Listener#handleException(Object, Throwable)} is called and then continues to call the other listeners.
173     * That is, if a listener throws an exception, the method is processed to complete successfully.
174     * <p>
175     * This method also dispatches to listeners of the higher class of the given event.
176     *
177     * @param event the event instance
178     * @param <T>   the event type
179     * @return the given event instance
180     * @throws IllegalStateException if this event bus is already closed
181     */
182    @NotNull <T extends E> T callEvent(@NotNull T event);
183
184    /**
185     * Calls {@link #callEvent(Object)} asynchronously.
186     *
187     * @param event the event instance
188     * @param <T>   the event type
189     * @return the {@link CompletableFuture} to get the given event instance
190     * @throws IllegalStateException if this event bus is already closed
191     */
192    @NotNull <T extends E> CompletableFuture<T> callEventAsync(@NotNull T event);
193
194    /**
195     * Calls {@link #callEvent(Object)} asynchronously.
196     *
197     * @param event    the event instance
198     * @param executor the executor to call {@link #callEvent(Object)}
199     * @param <T>      the event type
200     * @return the {@link CompletableFuture} to get the given event instance
201     * @throws IllegalStateException if this event bus is already closed
202     */
203    @NotNull <T extends E> CompletableFuture<T> callEventAsync(@NotNull T event, @NotNull Executor executor);
204
205    /**
206     * Calls {@link #callEvent(Object)} asynchronously.
207     * <p>
208     * The {@link Supplier} of the input of the {@link Function} is {@code () -> callEvent(event)},
209     * and the event will be called when {@link Supplier#get} is executed.
210     * <p>
211     * In {@link #callEventAsync(Object, Executor)},
212     * the {@link Supplier} is used as {@code supplier -> CompletableFuture.supplyAsync(supplier, executor)}
213     * to create the required {@link Function}.
214     *
215     * @param event          the event instance
216     * @param futureFunction the function to create {@link CompletableFuture}
217     * @param <T>            the event type
218     * @return the {@link CompletableFuture} to get the given event instance
219     * @throws IllegalStateException if this event bus is already closed
220     */
221    @NotNull <T extends E> CompletableFuture<T> callEventAsync(@NotNull T event,
222                                                               @NotNull Function<Supplier<T>, CompletableFuture<T>> futureFunction);
223
224    /**
225     * Closes this event bus.
226     *
227     * @throws IllegalStateException if this event bus is already closed
228     */
229    void close();
230
231    /**
232     * Checks if this event bus is closed.
233     *
234     * @return if this event bus is closed, returns {@code true}, otherwise {@code false}
235     */
236    boolean isClosed();
237
238    /**
239     * Adds the {@link Consumer} to consume {@link PostResult}.
240     *
241     * @param consumer the {@link Consumer} to add
242     * @return if the consumer has been added to this event bus, returns {@code true}, otherwise {@code false}
243     * @throws IllegalStateException if this event bus is already closed
244     */
245    @SuppressWarnings("UnusedReturnValue")
246    boolean addResultConsumer(@NotNull Consumer<@NotNull PostResult<?>> consumer);
247
248    /**
249     * Removes the {@link Consumer} to consume {@link PostResult}.
250     *
251     * @param consumer the {@link Consumer} to remove
252     * @return if the consumer has been removed from this event bus, returns {@code true}, otherwise {@code false}
253     * @throws IllegalStateException if this event bus is already closed
254     */
255    @SuppressWarnings("UnusedReturnValue")
256    boolean removeResultConsumer(@NotNull Consumer<@NotNull PostResult<?>> consumer);
257}
